abstract: Moelis & Company has appointed five senior directors to a new advisory board in an effort to win new clients and work with corporations and governments.
snippet: Moelis & Company has appointed five senior directors to a new advisory board in an effort to win new clients and work with corporations and governments.
lead_paragraph: Moelis & Company said on Tuesday that it had appointed five senior directors to a new advisory board in an effort to win new clients and work with corporations and governments.
